nodes.text: A task force was active in the Republic Navy of the Galactic Republic after the destruction of Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi's task force during the Clone Wars against the Separatist Alliance. General Kenobi and some of his surviving forces were rescued and were onboard this task force.

During the Clone Wars, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi' task force was destroyed during an attack by the Separatist Alliance and their naval forces. After several survivors including Kenobi and Marshal Commander CC-2224 "Cody" escaped in Republic escape pods, they were later rescued and situated on another Republic Navy task force.

This task force then later received the remnants of Hondo Ohnaka's Ohnaka Gang, as well as the Jedi younglings from the Crucible that were chaperoned by Jedi Commander Ahsoka Tano and Huyang after a battle on Florrum against the Separatists.
The task force was comprised of one Venator-class Star Destroyer, three Pelta-class frigates, and one Arquitens-class light cruiser. The task force also utilized Clone Z-95 Headhunters.

This task force first appeared, albeit unidentified, in the 2012 Star Wars: The Clone Wars season five episode "A Necessary Bond," and was identified as a task force in the episode guide on StarWars.com.
